title.rendered: Vaughan Handyman: Factors to Consider When Budgeting for a New Deck

content.rendered:
Backyard decks provide gathering and entertainment spaces for the family. People create so many happy memories on these simple wooden or composite structures. It is normal to want to make that memory-making space in your backyard, but you must consider the cost of the initial build and the expense of deck repair and maintenance services.

Owning a deck is about more than lounging and celebrating family. The deck requires proper installation and upkeep. Therefore, before you commit to the project, take the time to calculate a realistic budget.

Deck Repair and Maintenance Services Offer 4 Factors To Consider for a New Deck Budget

A lot goes into a new deck budget. You need to consider parts, labour, and upkeep. Creating a budget from scratch, especially if you never built a deck or ordered one for installation, is challenging.

Every project has hiccups along the way, even the most well-planned projects. For this reason, it is best to work with a professional deck builder to ensure your budget fits the scope of the work. For homeowners inexperienced with the deck-building process, keeping a few things in mind during the design phase is crucial.

1. Set a Realistic Budget

High-end deck design is a luxury. While many homeowners would love to add a multi-level deck with a fireplace, electricity, and numerous other features, such a deck is costly.

When figuring out your deck budget, talk to deck repair and maintenance services to learn about costs. The professionals can help you design a beautiful deck that fits within your budget.

Sometimes, the high-end finishes you think you want have more affordable and comparable options. For example, many people want composite decking because it requires less upkeep, but it is costlier. Wood decking, when correctly cared for, can last many years, maintain its durability, and save you some money.

2. Research Materials

Wooden structures require more upkeep than composite materials; that’s why wooden fence repair costs are often more than vinyl fence repair costs. If you want to save money for maintenance and upkeep, you need to research the materials available to you for your deck.

Composite decking is like a plastic material. It is rugged, durable, and lasts many years with minimal maintenance. That said, some people do not like the look of composite boards and prefer natural wood.

3. Choose the Location

Deck repair and maintenance services stress the importance of deck location. Many homeowners search for areas of their yards with the most shade and privacy. While each factor is important, too much shade can be detrimental.

A deck needs some sun to ensure it remains adequately dry. After a rainstorm, you do not want water to sit on the deck’s surface for too long. The quicker it dries, the safer your deck is against rot, mould, and mildew.

4. Calculate Maintenance Costs

A handyman in Vaughan can help you calculate an accurate budget for your new deck build. Still, you must also acknowledge and estimate the costs associated with maintaining the structure once it’s built.

Every two to three years, a wooden deck needs to be resealed. The deck needs a thorough cleaning every year, possibly a pressure washing. Also, a deck will settle over time and require new boards, screws, and other materials.

Deck Repair and Maintenance Services in Vaughan

Deck repair and maintenance services can help you create a realistic budget. Professionals can also help you research proper materials and select the correct location. If you would like to learn more about the costs associated with deck installations or maintenance, contact Handyman Connection and schedule a project estimate.
